alert.note: Alert for Davie; Gaston; Iredell; Lincoln; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 1:06PM EST until January 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Davie, Gaston, Iredell, Lincoln, and Rowan Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp. A Wind Advisory means that winds of 35 mph or greater are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
